docs.text: Nextedy WORKSHEET Instantly spot available or overloaded resources and ensure you deliver projects on time and with maximized effectivity. Discover available resources Browse the timeline of your project and access an overview of all the resources in your teams. Plan and track work directly from the timeline view. Maximize team capacity Check a live breakdown of team allocation in real-time, including the capacity and availability of every engineer. Find out if you are not overloading your team and determine needed capacity at a glance. Assign work records Assign work records to a team. Plan and manage work items in easy to use interactive interface. Team members can also plan their day directly in the Worksheet view.
